special_text:
As long as there are seven or more loyalty counters on Kalemn, she has lifelink and deathtouch.
[+2]: Kalemn deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[+1]: Kalemn deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[-7]: For each opponent, Kalemn deals 3 damage to that player unless they discard a card. Repeat this process six times.
